prompt:
Context:
You are an agent that is playing the rogue-like NetHack.
Always respond in first person.

Agent Information:
You are at position (74, 7).
avoid_monster_flag is set to False: Skills will fight monsters if they are in the way.
Game message 'Beware, there will be no return!  Still climb? [yn] (n)'.
You haven't prayed yet.

Rooms:
You are in room 0 which contains:
- stairs up at (74,7) reachable in 0 steps
- sink at (75,7) reachable in 1 steps

Close Monsters:
- tame kitten at (75,7) 1 steps east

Distant Monsters:
No monsters in the distance

Exploration Status:
room 0 can be further explored.

Inventory:
a: a +1 long sword (weapon in hand)
b: a +0 dagger (alternate weapon; not wielded)
c: an uncursed +3 small shield (being worn)
d: an uncursed food ration

Stats:
HP: 18 / 18
armor class: 6
strength: 20
dexterity: 11
constitution: 18
intelligence: 9
wisdom: 8
charisma: 9
energy: 1 / 1
depth: 1
dungeon number: 0
gold: 0
level: 1
exp: 1
score: 4
encumbrance: unencumbered
hunger: not hungry
alignment: Lawful
conditions: None

Task:
Your task is to win the game. Tips:
- Stay on the first 2 levels (depth=1/2, dungeon number=0) until you reached level 8.
- You can kick open locked doors, but that usually requires multiple tries. Note WHAMM means its still closed.
- When your health gets low, run away before healing.
- Corpses in your inventory will rot, do not eat them. Only eat freshly killed corpses. Keep eating corpses until satiated, but do not keep eating.
- Do not eat kobolds, they are poisonous.
- Only pray every 500 turns to fix bad situations, for example low health or when you are fainting.
- Use the keys "ykulnjbh" for specifying the directions "n ne e se s sw w nw". For example press the key "y" to indicate north.
- The skill "type_text" can be used to press multiple alphanumeric keys, use it to navigate menus faster.
- To move onto a tile occupied by a friendly monster stand next to it and press "m". Use this for shopkeepers.
- Dip long swords into fountains as a lawful character at level 5 or higher to get excalibur.
- Sacrifice corpses at altars for a chance to get powerful artifacts.
- You will timeout if you do not make progress for a while. So if something doesn't work on the first try, shift your focus onto something else.

Skills:
- press_key: Presses the given letter. For special keys only ESC, SPACE, and ENTER are supported. Params: (key: string)
- type_text: Types the text by pressing the keys in order. Params: (text: string)

Resolve the popup by pressing keys.
If you want to close the popup abort it using ESC or confirm your choices using enter or space.
Output your response in the following JSON format:
{
    "thoughts": {
        "observations": "<Relevant observations from your last action. Pay close attention to what you set out to do and compare that to the games current state.>",
        "reasoning": "<Plan ahead.>",
        "speak": "<Summary of thoughts, to say to user>"
    }
    "skill": {
        "name": "<The name of the skill>",
        "<param1_name>": "<The value for this parameter>",
        "<param2_name>": "<The value for this parameter>",
    }
}
